title: Liverpool scores a late winner against Tottenham to move to top of the English Premier League
description: Roberto Firmino scored a wonderful bullet-header in the dying moments of Wednesday's match to stun Tottenham Hotspur 2-1 and move Liverpool to the top of the English Premier League.

title: Sanders explains what's missing in current stimulus proposal
description: Sen. Bernie Sanders tells CNN's Wolf Blitzer what he believes is missing from the current coronavirus relief proposal, as congressional leaders are finally indicating they're nearing a deal on a new rescue package that could pass both chambers within days.

title: Prince William and Kate Middleton release family Christmas card photo
description: A new family portrait of William and Catherine, The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge, and their three children, George, Charlotte and Louis, has been released for their official Christmas card this year.

title: Why the US government hack is literally keeping security experts awake at night
description: The US government is reeling from multiple data breaches at top federal agencies, the result of a worldwide hacking campaign with possible ties to Russia. Investigators are still trying to figure out how much of the government may have been affected and how badly it may have been compromised.

title: Keiler explains why Fox News is targeting Bill Gates after CNN interview
description: CNN's Brianna Keilar breaks down why Fox News is targeting pandemic expert Bill Gates after Gates did an interview with CNN's Jake Tapper about restrictions as the US faces the second wave of coronavirus.

title: Trump sees special counsel investigations of Hunter Biden and election claims as payback for Russia probe
description: President Donald Trump is pushing extensively for the appointment of special counsels to separately investigate his baseless allegations of voter fraud and allegations surrounding Hunter Biden, the son of the President-elect, according to people familiar with the matter.

title: Avlon: 'Trump derangement syndrome' has taken on a new twist
description: CNN's John Avlon looks back at presidential 'derangement syndromes' and how the current one is afflicting President Trump and his supporters.

title: How Europe is handling a Covid-19 Christmas
McConnell has an 'election fraud' problem
Bill Gates, Amazon and British Airways are backing a hydrogen plane startup
description: A California-based startup that promises to make zero-carbon flight a reality has just received a major vote of confidence.

title: Air pollution a cause of nine-year-old girl's death, landmark ruling finds
description: A nine-year-old girl who died after an asthma attack is thought to be the first person in the world to have air pollution listed as a cause of death in a landmark coroner's ruling.

title: This dad spent 30 hours getting a tattoo of his son's birthmark
description: Derek Prue Sr. decided to get the tattoo after noticing his eight-year-old son insisted on wearing a shirt to the pool.

title: Paris mayor mocks fine imposed for hiring too many senior women
description: The mayor of Paris has branded as "absurd" a €90,000 ($109,369) fine imposed for appointing "too many women" to management positions.

title: Russian minister says Navalny poisoning reports 'funny to read'
description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov said Wednesday that reports about the details surrounding the poisoning of opposition figure Alexey Navalny are "funny to read," in an apparent reference to a CNN-Bellingcat investigation into the attack.

title: CNN's Arwa Damon goes inside a Covid-19 maternity ward
description: CNN's Arwa Damon goes inside an Istanbul maternity ward where the mothers are also being treated for Covid-19.

title: The Covid treatment you might not know
description: There are very few drugs that prevent people with early Covid-19 from progress to severe disease, but  monoclonal antibodies may be among them.

title: Boko Haram claims responsibility for kidnapping, prompting fear of increasing influence
description: Boko Haram has claimed responsibility for the kidnapping of over 30 schoolboys in northwestern Nigeria. Although CNN was unable to independently verify the authenticity of the message, if the claims are true it would indicating that Boko Haram has widened its influence far beyond its stronghold. CNN's David McKenzie reports.

title: Why we started an airline during a pandemic
description: For many airlines, 2020 has been a precarious year -- with carriers navigating not just how to keep employees and passengers safe, but also how to avoid bankruptcy and layoffs as the pandemic grinds global air traffic to a halt.

title: 'Salon under the sea' submarine dives to 1,000 meters
description: Stepping off a yacht and diving to the depths of the ocean in a transparent submarine might sound like an elaborate scene from a James Bond movie.

title: Kangaroos can ask humans for help, new study shows
description: It may sound a bit "Dr. Doolittle," but it turns out kangaroos can communicate with humans.

title: Australian police charge man in alleged international table tennis match-fixing syndicate
description: Australian police have charged a man as part of an ongoing investigation into an alleged transnational gambling syndicate placing corrupt bets on international table tennis tournaments.

title: Chaos at the top of China's biggest chipmaker
description: The C-suite of one of China's most important tech companies has just been thrown into confusion.

title: China's luxury market boomed this year, even as global sales shrank
description: China's luxury market has proved "unstoppable" this year even as the coronavirus pandemic hammered global demand for expensive goods.

title: At the world's oldest opera house, the show must go on
description: The world's oldest opera house, the Teatro di San Carlo in Italy, has survived wars, fires and the Neapolitan revolution. But this year, as the theater launches its winter season program, the doors to the public have remained closed. The theater has not seen a live audience since March, the longest time in its history, due to the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Watch for the 'Christmas Star' as Jupiter and Saturn come closer than they have in centuries
description: The two largest planets in our solar system are coming closer together than they have been since the Middle Ages, and it's happening just in time for Christmas -- hence the nickname of the "Christmas Star."

title: Loneliness can help grow parts of brain tied to imagination, study finds
description: As many people face the prospect of being alone for the holidays, new science is showing how loneliness might actually help build structures in the brain tied to imagination.

title: When the check hit her bank account, winning golfer suspected 'illegal activity'
description: It had got to the point in her career that golfer Sophia Popov was contemplating trying her hand at something else.

title: 5,000-year-old relic from the Great Pyramid discovered in a cigar box in Scotland
description: Late last year, curatorial assistant Abeer Eladany was reviewing items in the University of Aberdeen's museum collections, when she came across an item that didn't seem to belong.

title: Woman loses dog under massive amounts of sea foam
description: Several people jumped into action to save a dog that got lost under massive amounts of sea foam covering an Australian beach.

title: How Trump is fueling the alarming growth of QAnon
description: It started with a Tweet from a QAnon supporter at 2:09 in the morning: #SubpoenaObama.

title: Vaccines may not reach a quarter of the world's people until 2022, study finds
Covid vaccines will make little impact on the devastating winter ahead
description: • LIVE: Moderna submits data to FDA showing vaccine can potentially prevent infection

title: Gmail suffers another outage
description: Google suffered its second outage in as many days, with its email service Gmail going down on Tuesday.

title: First came news of a vaccine. Now come the scams.
description: The newly-approved Pfizer/BioNTech vaccine is slowly making its way across the US. But those eagerly waiting their turn need to beware of dangerous scams and misinformation about the vaccine's distribution.

title: Powerful storm heads for Fiji with hurricane-force winds
description: A powerful storm is barreling down on Fiji, bringing hurricane-force winds to the Pacific island nation.

title: Biden sends his most blunt signal yet
Canadian fashion designer Peter Nygard indicted on sex trafficking charges
description: A Finnish-Canadian designer was arrested in Canada Monday, after he was indicted in the United States for allegedly using his fashion business as a "façade of legitimacy" in order to conceal sex trafficking and other illegal activity, federal prosecutors allege.

title: Fake 'decoy' eggs are being used to track turtle poaching
description: The phone buzzed as the tracker came online, and a little circular blip appeared on the map. Helen Pheasey watched the dot intently as it moved inland from a beach on Costa Rica's Pacific coast.

title: Opinion: Our democratic institutions are facing threats from within the US
description: On Wednesday, I will testify before the Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Though I am no longer a public servant, it remains an honor to serve the public, and I am proud to heed the call of our Senate leaders to tell the public about the methodology of the agency I led, the Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA), to secure the 2020 presidential election.

title: Mitch McConnell recognizes Joe Biden for the first time as President-elect
description:
• Analysis: Biden's most forceful attempt yet to create the symbolism of a peaceful transfer of power
• Fox News' Geraldo Rivera tells Trump to stand down

title: Joe Biden picks Pete Buttigieg to be transportation secretary
Japanese 'Twitter killer' sentenced to death for murders of nine people
description: A Japanese man dubbed the "Twitter killer" who pleaded guilty to killing nine people in a high-profile mass murder case in 2017 was sentenced to death on Tuesday, the Tokyo District Court Tachikawa branch confirmed to CNN.

title: Melania Trump breaks children's hospital rules by taking her mask off to read to patients
description: First lady Melania Trump broke stated mask policy at Children's National Hospital Tuesday when she removed her mask to read a holiday book to children.

title: Mitch McConnell just made the lives of his Republican colleagues a lot harder
Joe Biden picks Pete Buttigieg to be transportation secretary
description: • Biden poised to nominate Granholm to lead Department of Energy
